summary: REQ-51 and REQ-53 appear implemented by replacing the Skills page with a new detailed, text-based SkillsDetailsSection component and reusing it on the Portfolio page beneath the projects grid. REQ-52 is only partially evidenced: the UI renders images via static paths and alt text, but the diff summary does not show the required image asset files being added to the frontend static assets.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create/provide one static frontend image asset per skill category (Legal, Digital Marketing, Graphics Design, Video Editing, WordPress Website Design) and render them alongside content with proper alt text.
missing_requirements.reason: The code references image paths under "/assets/generated/...png" and provides alt text, but the diff summary does not show the actual image files being added to the repository/static assets. Without the files, the images may 404 and would not satisfy the requirement to create and serve the visuals as static frontend assets.

hallucinated_features.description: Digital Marketing skill list includes items not requested (e.g., Email Marketing, Analytics & Reporting).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-51 specified particular digital marketing items (Facebook page creation/optimization, post scheduling, ads, social media management, SEO, SMM). The diff adds additional categories beyond those requested.
evidence: frontend/src/data/skillsDetails.ts (Digital Marketing categories include "Email Marketing" and "Analytics & Reporting")
